thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Handy
thread.title_full: Very Handy - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Louise R
title: Very Handy
text: Visited Westfield Shopping centre for the day and stayed in the Premier Inn on site, so convenient, straight from the centre into the Lobby of the Hotel. No car park but you can park in the Multi Storey for the Shopping Centre and it is Â£9.50 for 24hrs which isn't bad for London. Clean and tidy hotel, breakfast was manic as the area where the food was served was very small in comparison to the hotel itself. Great stay.
